features: 【SUPER SOFT VEGAN LEATHER】The exterior for this multi pockets ladies bags is made from high quality 100% eco friendly vegan faux leather, while the interior consists of a striped fabric lining and gold tone hardware. Our crossbody bags is durable and easy to clean, simply just wipe with water to keep this bag looking new.

【MEDIUM & LIGHTWEIGHT】This beautiful lightweight small bag measures 10" Hx 1.5"W x 10"D (Drop 24"). It can also hold all your personal belongings like mobile phones, wallets, credit cards, or even cardholders with absolute ease. Unlike those large handbags, you can well organise your items in this small and practical sling bag.

【SAFE ZIPPER POCKETS】This trendy fashionable bag features 2 zippered pockets and one snap pocket on the front. Interior contains 1 zipper pocket and 1 slip pocket. The top zipper pocket is smooth and easy to open and close. Our crossbody bag with a theft-deterring pocket for credit cards, provides protection, peace-of-mind and security.

【THOUGHTFUL GIFT】This comfortable crossbody bag with a removable and adjustable single shoulder strap,it can work as crossbody bag or single shoulder bag,is perfect gift for any occasion like christmas,valentines,birthdays and anniversaries. The casual-cool over the shoulder look of this luxury purse brings a stylish and vintage flair to all your looks.

【CUSTOMER SERVICE】Montana West provide worry free after service for every client. If you have any problem with our crossbody bag, please feel free to contact us, we can offer best solution for you(Exchange, Refund, etc).
body.description: Montana West combines the best of traditional western elements with a modern woman’s touch. We offer only the highest quality fabrics, trims, and hardwares, they are affordable that no other competitor can beat. Just as the Wild West is an integral part of American History, Montana West women goods are an integral part of the modern cowgirl’s outfit. Our items are more than just a simple accessory; they are to show off your individualism, strength, and trailblazing nature!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Montana West Crossbody Bag: Stylish Simplicity Meets Practical Perfection
reviews.reviewText: The Montana West Crossbody Bag has effortlessly earned its five-star status in my style and functionality playbook.For traveling, this bag is a dream. With its thoughtfully designed multi-pocket layout, it accommodates all my essentials—passport, wallet, keys, and more—with ease. It's like having a compact travel companion that keeps everything organized and easily accessible. A definite five-star feature for the wanderlust in all of us.Lightweight is an understatement. This bag practically defies gravity. It's the ideal companion for those on-the-go moments when every ounce matters. Whether I'm exploring a new city or navigating a bustling airport, the lightweight design ensures comfort without sacrificing style.Softness is where this bag truly excels. The washed leather feels like a luxurious embrace. It's not just a bag; it's a tactile experience. The softness adds a touch of elegance while maintaining durability—a rare combination that deserves all five stars.In conclusion, the Montana West Crossbody Bag is a winner in every aspect. Perfect for travel, unbelievably lightweight, and luxuriously soft, it's a five-star addition to any wardrobe. 🌍👜✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for dog-walking
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard to believe that a bag this attractive and functional can also be so inexpensive. It’s perfect for taking my dog for long daily walks in NYC with separate pockets for balls, treats, poop bags, money, tissues, cellphone and other necessities, all within easy reach. It’s big enough to hold a coffee thermos, yet small enough to stay out of my way and keep my hands free. The leather has also stood up well to spilled coffee, dried mud and soaking rain. I’ve just talked myself into buying a few more for friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag is the perfect size--it holds all the necessities and the material is very, very soft. Strap is adjustable for shoulder or crossbody and zippers are sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but too small
reviews.reviewText: The bag is really cute. It's super soft and seems quite sturdy. My first problem is that the outside front snap pocket is so narrow you can't even get your hand into it. The second issue is that if you're any heavier than 90 pounds, the strap is way too short to actually wear it cross body. The third problem is that although the main pocket IS nice and deep, the depth from front to back is so narrow that you barely have the space to put anything in it - and if you do, you can't make use of the inner zip pocket or the inner pouches, or put anything into the rear outside zipped pocket.Honestly, I'm very disappointed. I love the color and the texture of the thing, but the layout is crippled by the poorly thought out dimensions and the too-small strap. The construction is nice, but the bag is mostly useless unless you're a teenager in high school. I ended up giving it to my daughter. She loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of pockets! Went from my 8” wide x 7” high Green purse to my new Montana West Crossbody purse!
reviews.reviewText: See picture! Wanted a purse a little bigger than my small green purse that didn’t have quite enough room to carry what I needed. I’ve been looking and found purses that were either too small or way too large! Love this new purse - just the right size, soft feel, plenty of storage pockets, aesthetically good looking, nice wide adjustable shoulder strap, inside zippered pocket of the main zippered purse area is big enough to hold a mini hard-shell RFID Blocking case. Nice pocket on the outside of purse with a small magnetic closure and deep enough to keep my cell-phone in a stand-up position within easy reach. Just finished switching my ‘stuff’ over to my new purse and still have room galore! This purse helps me to organize nicely!A couple concerns but nothing to stop me from purchasing this purse in a different color. The inner nylon lining in the main compartment feels a bit thin; time will tell how well it will hold up. The main zipper to the main compartment seems to be a touch short, but not a deal breaker since I don’t carry one of those long rectangular wallets - I have a shorter folding wallet that fits perfectly. Over-all I’m very satisfied with this purse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this bag. Has all the pockets that I need. I can fit everything that was in my big bag. Nice size and soft leather. Also love the color. Same as in picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Although the product description lists ‘soft washed leather’ in actuality it is faux leather.
reviews.reviewText: When I buy a product, I would like to have it listed right away what the product is made of. Soft washed leather indicates that it is made of pure leather, however listed lower it states that it is made of vegan leather, which in actuality is faux leather according to Alexa, with no further descriptions of its capability of withstanding wear and tear as real leather can handle. I will keep it but am disappointed that truth in advertising does not always apply to products sold on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's very well made, soft and all the pockets make it easy to organize and not have to "dig" for what I need.
